text: Dolce & Gabbana, often called D&G;, is an Italian fashion label. They make and sell clothes including shirts and underwear. The company was founded in Milan in 1985 by Domenico Dolce and Stefano Gabbana. Category:1985 establishments in Europe Category:1980s establishments in Italy Category:Italian fashion houses Category:Clothing companies Category:Companies based in Milan
title: Dolce & Gabbana
